#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

char L[20010], K[20010];

int main() {
	int t; scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%s %s", L, K);
		int len1 = strlen(L), len2 = strlen(K);
		if(len1 - 1 != len2) {
			printf("0\n");
			continue;
		}
		int idx = 0; bool only = false;
		for(int i = 0; i < len1; ++i) {
			if(!only && i == len1 - 1 && idx == len2) only = true;
			else if(!only && L[i] != K[idx]) only = true;
			else if(only && L[i] != K[idx]) break;
			else idx++;
		}
		if(only && idx == len2) printf("1\n");
		else printf("0\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
